official_title: A resolution designating Sunday, November 17, 1985, as a national day of prayer.

summary.text: Designates Sunday, November 17, 1985, as a national day of prayer to seek God's guidance and mark the beginning of a U.S./Soviet transition from life-threatening nuclear weapons to defensive systems.
